bug.short_desc: Maven build includes management client source in jar

long_desc.thetext:
The jar built using Maven includes the following source files:
org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/ConfigurationsFrame.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/ShowErrorForm.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/AgentConnection.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/ShowErrorForm.form org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/ConfigurationsFrame.form org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/NotificationsFrame.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/SettingsPersistence.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/NotificationsFrame.form org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/SettingsFrame.java org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/SettingsFrame.form org/opensolaris/opengrok/management/client/OpenGrokTrayApp.java
They should not be in the jar.
